name: Lyla, Twilightsworn Mage
desc: Once per turn, when a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Lightsworn" monster from your hand or GY, then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy it. Once per turn, if another of your "Lightsworn" monsters activates its effect: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY.
